page.title: 09OLDEST SHOP IN S.CROYDON
page.content: Trengrove Antiques is situated in South Croydon's main street,known as South End.It was converted for use as a shop in the early 1800's.Before it bacame an{antique shop}it was a greengrocers ,and before that a semi_detached cottage.The shop has been in the family for well over a century.It still retains its wooden supports,although the back of the shop has been rebuilt by the present owner, Brian Trengrove. The wooden beamed front with its high class antiques seems the ideal place for a{supernatural}siting.Strange noises and groanings have been heard , and a white figure resmbling Mr.Trengrove's great grandfather has been seen.
